channel.title: Turmoilpkerz updates || vine whip || clipped following ||new hit plates||
channel.description:
hey guys i know this was posted but it didn't get bumped back up and you would not be able to see my updates and i would like you too see them. that bad thing about the vine whip is the special bar dont drain working on that
Red: Haven't Started Orange: Started Not Completed Green: Completed
Agility WoodCutting Thieving Prayer FireMaking Fletching Minining Fishing Slayer Farming Summoning Cooking RuneCrafting Herblore
Im sorry i don't know how to make these so i used X Entinity X call me bad but idunno how to make the video pictures like that when i record them it fucks up anyway [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2v9sw8h.gif[/img]
added the vine whip special attack and the gfx [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture224.png[/img] vine whip added [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture219.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture218.png[/img]
to stop you from dying when you dont have the right amount off hp [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture216.png[/img] overload [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture214.png[/img]
new shop interface [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture208.png[/img]
fix these hit plates a while back [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture209.png[/img]
and the older pictures [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture202.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture203.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture201.png[/img] [img]http://i1192.photobucket.com/albums/aa329/stnbarton1/4-1.png[/img]
